about_the_game:
Add-on installment #1 includes the new playable character Charlotte and a new Japanese-style outfit for Yami.

Contents:
- New playable character: Charlotte
- Challenge Scenario: "Charlotte" (Voiced)
- New outfit for Yami: Japanese-style
- New custom voice pack for Yami
- Film Set: Magic Knights Comedy Set
- New player icons
